+extern "rust-call" fn foo() { } //~ ERROR rust-call ABI is subject to change
+
+trait Foo {
+    extern "rust-call" fn foo();
+}
+
+impl Foo for i32 {
+    extern "rust-call" fn foo() { } //~ ERROR rust-call ABI is subject to change
+}
+
+fn main() { }
